overall_goal: Orchestral-SpeedCore track with lyrics about Fizz La Metta
role_goal: Manage sound definition and sonic engineering for music tracks.

sonic_palette.genre_fusion: High-energy SpeedCore foundation layered with rich, dramatic Orchestral elements.
sonic_palette.mood: Intense, exhilarating, epic, chaotic, with underlying themes of grandeur and potential decay. A sense of high-stakes drama and relentless forward momentum.

tempo.notes: Predominantly fast, with potential for dramatic tempo shifts or perceived shifts through rhythmic density.

orchestral_elements.purpose: Provide scale, drama, emotional depth, and a sense of 'epicness'. Contrast with and sometimes be overwhelmed by SpeedCore elements.

instrumentation.description: Full string section (violins, violas, cellos, double basses) providing sweeping melodic lines, urgent ostinatos, and dramatic stabs. High-pitched strings for intense, fast melodic fragments; low strings for dark, rumbling foundation.
Powerful brass section (horns, trumpets, trombones, tuba) for fanfares, heroic motifs, aggressive punctuation, and dark, ominous textures. Trombones and tuba add weight to the low end.
Used for color, texture, and specific melodic flourishes. Flutes/piccolos for piercing, frantic quality; clarinets/oboes for melancholic or dissonant passages.
Timpani for dramatic rolls/impacts, large orchestral bass drums for epic hits, cymbals for crashes/accents. Often sync with or augment SpeedCore drum patterns.

orchestral_elements.arrangement_style: Dramatic, employing rapid arpeggios, powerful fanfares, dissonant harmonies, and sudden dynamic shifts. Orchestral parts may feel 'out of control' or fight against SpeedCore elements.

speedcore_elements.purpose: Provide relentless energy, aggression, and driving force.

instrumentation.description: Heavily distorted kick drums (double/quad-kick), fast snare rolls, aggressive hi-hats, complex/rapid percussion patterns. Emphasis on rhythmic intensity and power.
Distorted, aggressive lead synths with fast, often atonal/dissonant melodies. Dark, atmospheric pads for tension. Aggressive bass synths for powerful, driving low-end.
Glitchy, distorted, and processed vocal chops or environmental sounds for texture and chaos.

speedcore_elements.arrangement_style: Relentless, high-frequency focus, characterized by rapid repetition, complex rhythmic programming, and extreme distortion.

sonic_textures_and_effects: Heavy Distortion & Saturation (drums, synths, some orchestral elements)
Reverb & Delay (vast space and chaotic effects)
Extensive Automation (volume, filter, effects for dynamics and transitions)
Unique Sound Design (blending orchestral and synthetic sources)

lyrical_alignment_notes.Energy_Chaos: SpeedCore drums/synths, rapid string ostinatos, frantic woodwinds.
lyrical_alignment_notes.Grandeur_Decay: Full orchestra, brass fanfares, timpani rolls, contrasted with broken/distorted orchestral moments.
lyrical_alignment_notes.Thrill_Edge: Fast tempos, aggressive rhythms, sharp dynamic contrasts, dissonant harmonies, piercing sounds.
lyrical_alignment_notes.Obsession_Addiction: Repetitive motifs, driving basslines, sense of being trapped.
lyrical_alignment_notes.Transformation: Dramatic shifts in instrumentation, tempo, dynamics; use of build-ups and breakdowns.
